Header: Driver Remanded Over Accident in Wattappalai
Content: The driver of the mini lorry that crashed and killed one soldier on duty at Wattappalai Army sentry point on Tuesday (16) evening was remanded until 25 April 2019 by Mullaittivu Magistrate Court after he was arrested by the Mulliyaweli Police and produced in the Court. The driver, Thavarasa Yogeshwaran (41) of Kumarapuram, Mulliyaweli lost control of his fast speeding lorry and crashed against the Military Police sentry point near Wattappalai junction, killing one soldier and injuring another soldier who is now receiving under treatment in hospital.
